adapterOffline: Attention, the adapter is either offline or is being restarted.  Adding new devices is only possible when the adapter is switched on. Please start the adapter when it is powered on and wait until the reboot is complete.
deleteConfirmation1: Are you sure you want to delete the following tablet?
deleteConfirmation2: This also automatically deletes all associated objects after the adapter restart.
ipInUse: IP address %s is already in use. Please enter another IP address.
mqttNotInstalled: Mqtt adapter is not installed!!! Please install the Adapter first, before you activate the function.
name: Name
nameInUse: Device with the same name already exists. There must not be any identical names. Please assign a different name.
tooltipEnableMQTT: Enable or disable the MQTT integration
tooltipEnabled: Enable or disable the Tablet request
tooltipIp: IP address of the tablet in ip4 format example: 192.0.0.1
tooltipMqttInstance: Here please select the instance name of the MQTT broker default: mqtt.0
tooltipTabletEditName: Changing the name is unfortunately not possible, as this would require the object ID to be changed as well, and that is not possible. Please delete the config and create it again.
tooltipTabletMqttEnabled: Enables or disables the MQTT query for this tablet
tooltipTabletName: Enter the name of the tablet here. After creation, the change is no longer possible.
tooltipTopic: Here please enter the topic set in the wallpanel for mqtt communication here example ⇨ wallpanel/samsung
